title: How to Put a Cover Photo on a Music File Using Windows Media Player

steps.headline: Drag the file into the music section of the library.
Drag the picture you want the cover photo to be to the note sign (highlighted).
It will be like this when done.

text: Open Windows Media Player.  Drag the file into the music section of the library.  Drag the picture you want the cover photo to be to the note sign (highlighted).  It will be like this when done.
sentences: Drag the file into the music section of the library.
Drag the picture you want the cover photo to be to the note sign (highlighted).
It will be like this when done.
